previewArticle.title: New England Revolution vs. Columbus Crew SC | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: New England Revolution 0, Columbus Crew SC 0 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Foes in the MLS Cup Playoffs a season ago, the New England Revolution and Columbus Crew SC meet for the first time this season when the clubs face off Saturday afternoon at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: New England Revolution vs Columbus Crew SC | April 11, 2015

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Hand ball by Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew SC).
Offside, New England Revolution. Teal Bunbury tries a through ball, but Jermaine Jones is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Brothers Hansen
timelineItems.text: Such wind in new England right now, even Shuttleworth's hair is moving #NEvCLB #MLS #mlslive

timelineItems.desc: Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Jermaine Jones cuts down Tchani

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: No Tierney to take these attacking free kicks. Going to be on Nguyen & Rowe likely #NERevs

timelineItems.name: KJ
timelineItems.text: A great day for some soccer. #CrewSC http://t.co/KyNiY1HE3V

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Grana is his usual energetic self up and down the right flank; beautiful cross to Finlay that was nearly finished. #CrewSC #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution).
Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC).

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: 12' First yellow card of the game goes to Jermaine Jones after contact with Tony Tchani. No love lost between those two. #CrewSC #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) header from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Kelyn Rowe sends a soft header right to Clark

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Teal Bunbury with a headed pass.

timelineItems.name: ben snowfley
timelineItems.text: The Fort is in EXCELLENT form today. @MidnightRiders @NErebellion #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC using their width well #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Hunter Farrell
timelineItems.text: #NERevs back line looks strong today. Would love to see Donny Smith get some action.

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Kevin Alston.
Attempt missed. Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the left. Assisted by Justin Meram with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Gotta pull the trigger there Grana. #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Justin Meram finding a lot of open space behind the front line, and he's twice found Grana on the right. Leads to first #CrewSC corner.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: The more Barnes and Alston play, the more you see just how deep the Revs are on defense. Both playing really well early #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution).
Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Offside, New England Revolution. Jermaine Jones tries a through ball, but Juan Agudelo is caught offside.
Match ends, New England Revolution 0, Columbus Crew SC 0.

timelineItems.name: Keith Collette
timelineItems.text: Not exactly a work of art, but it's a point. #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: FT: All even in New England as @NERevolution & @ColumbusCrewSC finish scoreless --> http://t.co/1fcU3IVfxG #NEvCLB http://t.co/sIsGnZ1PuQ

timelineItems.desc: Foes in the MLS Cup Playoffs a season ago, the New England Revolution and Columbus Crew SC meet for the first time this season when the clubs face off Saturday afternoon at Gillette Stadium.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: New England Revolution vs Columbus Crew SC | April 11, 2015

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: A hard-earned point apiece for @NERevolution & @ColumbusCrewSC. HIGHLIGHTS: http://t.co/7O4hU0qF69 #NEvCLB http://t.co/f13tK8xlS5

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Kei Kamara curls a long range effort high of the target

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Justin Meram (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Andrew Farrell.
Attempt blocked. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC) header from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Federico Higuaín.

timelineItems.name: Drew Zuhosky
timelineItems.text: That was #CrewSC's best chance of the day so far. #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses the top left corner.

timelineItems.name: Victoria Masterson
timelineItems.text: The chants are spreading outside the fort at todays #NERevs game. Love it.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: It's good to see #CrewSC back to playing their game. Will it work though on the road here?

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Justin Meram has been everywhere so far today. Offense, defense, central, wide, everywhere. #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Tim
timelineItems.text: Such a different style in the attack with Grana in there #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Rowe and Bunbury have switched sides. Take notice #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC).

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Last season, Jones mentioned how much he appreciated Bunbury’s runs when he gets the ball forward. Perfect example of it right there #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: That ball to Bunbury from Jones brings back memories of 2014 #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: Updated crowd shot. Beautiful day for some soccer. #NERevs #NEvCLB http://t.co/2rA64iecdl

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: It has to be said, Columbus Crew are a joy to watch. They play entertaining football at a good pace which is what we love to see #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Hunter Farrell
timelineItems.text: Opened the window here in Louisville KY and I swear I can hear the #NERevs Fort all the way from Gillette Stadium.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: If I didn't know any better, I'd think New England had played the mid-week game on the other side of the continent so far. #CrewSC #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: #NERevs are being plagued by poor touches in several areas of the field - playing right into #CrewSC hands in their possession game

timelineItems.name: Andrew Muskatello
timelineItems.text: Good Ole Gillette #NERevs #BlessTheRains

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Higuain's last goal was against the #NERevs on 11/1/14 #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: PressRowSports
timelineItems.text: As expected, a great midfield battle going on today at @GilletteStadium between Tony Tchani and Jermaine Jones. Almost 30 min. in #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Chris Klute.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: While it seemed to have been abandoned in Vancouver, we're seeing flashes of increased pressing from #CrewSC today... and it's helping.

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Darrius Barnes tries a through ball, but José Gonçalves is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Darrius Barnes.
Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Jermaine Jones.
Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Kelyn Rowe.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC currently outshooting #NERevs 5 to 1.

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) because of an injury.
Dangerous play by Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC).
Darrius Barnes (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Lee Nguyen flips a shot at Clark

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Very audible gasps in the press box as we get the replays of Kamara's foul on Barnes #CrewSC #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Juan Agudelo with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC dodged an against the run of play bullet; both Jones and Darrius Barnes had chances in front of the net. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC maintained a stunning 85% of the possession from the 15th till 20th minute. #NERevs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Hernán Grana.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: Lots of coaching going on during that break. Berhalter to players, players to other players. #CrewSC trying to make something happen.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Great save by Clark. Put himself in great position to stop that Agudelo attempt. Great cross from Alston #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Keith Collette
timelineItems.text: First real spurt of pressure from the Revs. Only took them about 35 minutes. #CrewSC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Jermaine Jones tries a through ball, but Juan Agudelo is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: #NERevs broadcast said they expect Jones to play only a half. Could make a big difference in the 2nd. #CrewSC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Kevin Alston.

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC still seems to be working through some spacing issues. Too many guys in too small of a space.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mohammed Saeid (Columbus Crew SC).
Jermaine Jones (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: 7 mins until half-time and it's still 0-0 but by no means dull. Both sides looking likely to create something at some point #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: #NERevs the clear aggressor here in the closing stages - #CrewSC trying to hold on, looking out of sorts defensively.

timelineItems.name: Nathan Smith
timelineItems.text: Grana has apparently never been told to not dribble inside the 18. #NEvCLB #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Revs starting to take a hold in the game now. More possession higher up the pitch, can they make it count before the break? #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Columbus Crew SC. Federico Higuaín tries a through ball, but Ethan Finlay is caught offside.
Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: alan garcia
timelineItems.text: Today's @NERevolution 's line up is more of what I had in mind in pre season. Only @ChrisTierney8 is missing due to injury #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Mohammed Saeid (Columbus Crew SC).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Nguyen has looked good today. Might be his best game of 2015 so far #NERevs

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: 45' Minimum of two minutes additional time. #NERevs #CrewSC #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.
Chris Klute (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Mind of Abram
timelineItems.text: #NERevs are starting to fill the Fort regularly. Now if some of that could spill to the rest of the stadium.

timelineItems.name: Todd Fichtenberg
timelineItems.text: Bunbury just got shushed by the AR with a finger to his lips. LOL never seen that before. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Andrew Stankey
timelineItems.text: Seems like #CrewSC needs to just try and get some shots on goal. Lots of passing into dangerous areas but few shots.

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: HT: Decent looks for both sides but no score. @LeeNguyen24 couldn't quite poke this one home: http://t.co/Ku57Wfgjbh #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Columbus Crew SC 0.
Second Half begins New England Revolution 0, Columbus Crew SC 0.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: Jones coming off should make things easier for #CrewSC and Pipa specifically.

timelineItems.name: Ben Jata
timelineItems.text: Caldwell tracking Higuain. Meram finding space behind Jones. #NEvCLB #CrewSC

timelineItems.comment: Hernán Grana (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Dangerous play by Kelyn Rowe (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Corey Capoccia
timelineItems.text: Nice to see Joey Franchino in the Fort today. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Mind of Abram
timelineItems.text: Passing is just slightly off. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: Keith Collette
timelineItems.text: Juuuuuuuuuust out of Kamara's reach. #CrewSC

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: Heading into this game, #CrewSC had a passing accuracy of 79.1%, second behind Orlando. I think that's showing today #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: Rowe already much more aggressive in the 2nd half than in the 1st. #NERevs

timelineItems.desc: Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Juan Agudelo undercuts Pogatetz

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC are much more capable of counterattacking the Revs' high press this year than in the playoffs last year. Draw them in. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: David Wilson
timelineItems.text: Lack of movement from #NERevs attackers making it difficult to break down #CrewSC at the moment

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution).
Michael Parkhurst (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Emanuel Pogatetz (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: ð¥Flames McDeath ð
timelineItems.text: Not a bad view. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Mohammed Saeid (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Tony Tchani.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: All the mistakes that were plaguing the Revolution in the first half are now afflicting #CrewSC - hard time keeping possession

timelineItems.name: Soccer in America
timelineItems.text: Goals? #MLS #NEvCLB #PHIvNYC

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC getting muscled off the ball with regularity early on. Finlay, Higuain, now Grana. Referees letting them play today.

timelineItems.comment: Emanuel Pogatetz (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Juan Agudelo (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Brian Fraga
timelineItems.text: Good to see @Jermainejunior back on the pitch #NeRevs

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Other team using two subs before the 60 min mark? #CrewSC will take that.

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: Lots of speed now in the attack for #NERevs. #CrewSC defense should take note (as I know they read my tweets).

timelineItems.desc: Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Tony Tchani pulls Nguyen down

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Things definitely getting more difficult for #CrewSC. Tired legs? #NERevs raising intensity? Perhaps both.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: Certainly a foul, but Nguyen sold it for the yellow. #CrewSC #Revs

timelineItems.desc: Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew SC) is shown the yellow card.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Federico Higuain is booked during a dead ball stoppage

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.
timelineItems.title: SHOT: Lee Nguyen has his free kick scooped up by Clark

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Drew
timelineItems.text: Longest free kick wait ever #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Nguyen hits the free kick at Clark who fumbles it before pouncing on the loose ball #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).
Emanuel Pogatetz (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Higuain simply can't help himself. Another yellow for encroaching/yelling at the referee. #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC's second half passing is at just 64% (#NERevs at 72%). Crew. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.desc: Andy Dorman (New England Revolution) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Andy Dorman with the tactical foul

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC).
Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Andy Dorman (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Ben Ferree
timelineItems.text: When you get a reputation for picking up stupid yellows, refs know. They will be plenty happy to add another to your ledger. #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Poor decision by Dorman to make that foul there - no danger to Meram's run out of his own defensive third. #NERevs

timelineItems.name: David Dir
timelineItems.text: Columbus extremely physical in this game, lots of little thing red is letting go #NEvCLB

timelineItems.desc: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Hernan Grana with a cross.
timelineItems.title: CHANCE: Ethan Finlay has his shot attempt stuffed by Farrell

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: The referee is starting to brandish the yellow cards now. 3 in 6 mins #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Charlie Davies.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: That’s a great solo defensive play by Alston. Love how he’s playing today #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Steve Clark (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Teal Bunbury (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Seth
timelineItems.text: 13,092 in attendance for tonight's #NERevs vs #CrewSC game

timelineItems.name: Fish n' Chips Soccer
timelineItems.text: 20mins to go in #NEvCLB - can #NERevs get the goal that will take them top of the Eastern Conference? #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by José Gonçalves (New England Revolution).
Justin Meram (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Into the final 20 mins now and the Crew would probably be happy with a point now. The Revs will push to the end... #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: MassiveCity
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC are going to have to earn a set piece or a couple more corners to win this. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Patrick Murphy
timelineItems.text: I know many of these #CrewSC players are playing on heavily legs, but there's been little to no offense after the 20 or so minute mark.

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: This thing will be ending sans-goals, won't it? #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Todd Fichtenberg
timelineItems.text: Maybe Stein should've come in for Pipa so he doesn't get a second yellow. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Andrew Helms
timelineItems.text: Being subversive at #NEvCLB http://t.co/lPYNT0TNUu

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from outside the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Chad Barson.

timelineItems.name: Erik Bobbitt
timelineItems.text: A big part of #CrewSC's possession/buildup from the back is based on the full-field switch. Sorta think the wind has limited that.

timelineItems.name: Matt LaPan
timelineItems.text: The passing today from the Revs is just not as crisp as it needs to be. Few good passes and they get their chance #NERevs

timelineItems.name: John Bava III
timelineItems.text: Steindorsson comes on for Finlay; has seen action on both sides of the attacking midfield so far for #CrewSC this season. #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Justin Meram (Columbus Crew SC).
Kevin Alston (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.

timelineItems.name: Rick Thomas
timelineItems.text: What was THAT shot?!?!?! #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Fish n' Chips Soccer
timelineItems.text: If #NEvCLB ends 0-0, #CrewSC will have played 5, scored 5, conceded 5 and have 5 points. #MLS #5alive

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Ethan Finlay (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked. Assisted by Hernán Grana with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Neil Brown
timelineItems.text: The #CrewSC attack is looking promising so far. Not a fan of how physical this match has been, though.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC are not playing to counter in this game - they're back to a possession game.

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #CrewSC with 62.7% of the early possession. Impressive effort on the road to start. #NERevs #NEvCLB

timelineItems.name: Chris Meister
timelineItems.text: How about a goal, boys? #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Adam Jardy
timelineItems.text: Still one sub to use for #CrewSC. Honestly not sure who I'd sub in right now for this group. Maybe Meram (fatigue) but it's my MOTM.

timelineItems.comment: Scott Caldwell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kei Kamara (Columbus Crew SC).

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: 10 mins to go and the game has developed into the 'it's going to take something special or a mistake to win it now' stage #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Joe Tansey
timelineItems.text: Charlie Davies & Juan Agudelo playing together for the #NERevs right now. Imagine if that was the #USMNT set up w/ Jozy if both were 100%.

timelineItems.name: Matt Bernhardt
timelineItems.text: Looks like Schoenfeld is set to come on for #CRewSC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New England Revolution. Andrew Farrell tries a through ball, but Diego Fagundez is caught offside.
Offside, New England Revolution. Andrew Farrell tries a through ball, but Charlie Davies is caught offside.
Corner,  Columbus Crew SC. Conceded by Scott Caldwell.

timelineItems.desc: Mohammed Saeid (Columbus Crew SC) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
timelineItems.title: YELLOW CARD: Mohammed Saeid trips up Davies

timelineItems.name: Keith Collette
timelineItems.text: Two Revs players wipe each other out. #Ouchie #CrewSC

timelineItems.name: Mind of Abram
timelineItems.text: Last year, even before the playoffs, I remember thinking #NERevs & #CrewSC had some exciting, fun to watch games. This one has been abysmal.

timelineItems.comment: Charlie Davies (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Mohammed Saeid (Columbus Crew SC).

timelineItems.name: Fish n' Chips Soccer
timelineItems.text: Into the final 5 mins in #NEvCLB still waiting for the deadlock to be broken #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Diego Fagundez.
Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Michael Parkhurst.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: It's a shame to say it, but this game has rather fizzled out into a stalemate. No real chances to mention in this second half #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Here's hoping that if we criticise the lack of goals, then we may curse a goal into the net... Please? #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Chris Meister
timelineItems.text: Pipa dribbling around in the corner with 8 players standing in the box probably isn't going to get it done #CrewSC

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Federico Higuain (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is close, but misses.
timelineItems.title: MISS: Federico Higuain laces a shot wide

timelineItems.name: Justin Churchill
timelineItems.text: Diego Fagundez is the one bright spot of a dull and listless second half for both teams. #NERevs #CrewSC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Jason Rantz
timelineItems.text: How many yellow cards in this #NEvCLB match? Yeesh.

timelineItems.name: Andrew King
timelineItems.text: Really just not sure why #CrewSC have been taking so many short corners this year. Why not swing a ball in for Schoenfeld/Tchani/Pogatetz?

timelineItems.comment: Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: Major League Soccer
timelineItems.text: Former @NERevolution midfielder Joe Franchino (162 Apps.) refused club seats to sit in "The Fort" today. #NEvCLB http://t.co/sTAaH33fw6

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: A bright start from the Crew here and the Revs have barely ventured outside their own half in the first 7 mins #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt missed. Federico Higuaín (Columbus Crew SC) right footed shot from a difficult angle and long range on the right is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Kristinn Steindórsson.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Wow, Lee Nguyen uncharacteristically hits his corner straight out of play. It didn't even come on. Sums the game up #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Hernán Grana (Columbus Crew SC) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution).

timelineItems.name: NESoccerToday.com
timelineItems.text: #NERevs result at half time (W/L/D) has also been their full time result in every game this season. Likely to continue. Via @GJohnstone12

timelineItems.comment: Dangerous play by Tony Tchani (Columbus Crew SC).
Lee Nguyen (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Four mins added on. A goal looks unlikely but we can dream! #NEvCLB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Mind of Abram
timelineItems.text: Guys, I think the Fort wants everyone to stand up. #NERevs

timelineItems.comment: Andrew Farrell (New England Revolution) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Aaron Schoenfeld (Columbus Crew SC).

timelineItems.name: WrongSideOfThePond
timelineItems.text: Yeah, it's just not happening today... #CrewSC.

timelineItems.name: Ben Ashton
timelineItems.text: Both sides have lacked any real quality with their final ball. It isn't 0-0 through lack of desire, just lack of killer instinct #NEvCLB

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New England Revolution. Conceded by Hernán Grana.
Offside, New England Revolution. Scott Caldwell tries a through ball, but Lee Nguyen is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: NE Revolution
timelineItems.text: FT #NERevs 0 #CrewSC 0 A late corner for the Revolution comes to nothing and the sides will split the points here @GilletteStadium.

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, New England Revolution 0, Columbus Crew SC 0.
